body_html: Hi @ebrevdo, the NLP team from Winton will be at the ACL conference next week. We will be happy to meet with someone from the tensorflow team if they are attending. We thought it might be more efficient seeing as this PR proposes an update in core tensorflow and might require further discussion/alternate implementation ideas.

body: Hi @ebrevdo, the NLP team from Winton will be at the ACL conference next week. We will be happy to meet with someone from the tensorflow team if they are attending. We thought it might be more efficient seeing as this PR proposes an update in core tensorflow and might require further discussion/alternate implementation ideas.
